=-- Upsert payment
INSERT INTO payments (
  printavo_id,
  amount,
  payment_method,
  payment_date,
  notes,
  created_at,
  updated_at,
  published_at
)
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.printavo_id }}',
  {{ $json.amount || 0 }},
  '{{ ($json.payment_method || 'Unknown').replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  {{ $json.payment_date ? "'" + $json.payment_date + "'" : 'NULL' }},
  '{{ ($json.notes || '').replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  {{ $json.created_at ? "'" + $json.created_at + "'" : 'NOW()' }},
  NOW(),
  NOW()
)
ON CONFLICT (printavo_id) DO UPDATE SET
  amount = EXCLUDED.amount,
  payment_method = EXCLUDED.payment_method,
  payment_date = EXCLUDED.payment_date,
  notes = EXCLUDED.notes,
  updated_at = NOW()
RETURNING id, printavo_id;

=-- Link payment to order via payments_order_lnk
-- Uses Printavo invoice ID to find the order
INSERT INTO payments_order_lnk (payment_id, order_id, payment_ord)
SELECT 
  p.id,
  o.id,
  1
FROM payments p
CROSS JOIN orders o
WHERE p.printavo_id = '{{ $json.printavo_id }}'
  AND o.printavo_id = '{{ $json.order_printavo_id }}'
  AND NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM payments_order_lnk pol WHERE pol.payment_id = p.id AND pol.order_id = o.id
  );
